short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform ChatGPT's user interface with customisable accent colour, font styles and chats width, modern designs and chat bubbles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚠️ KNOWN ISSUE ⚠️ 
   • When changing theme mode using the GPThemes floating button, the Canvas Code syntax highlighting doesn't update immediately, remaining in the previous theme's syntax style, while the website's theme changes and works correctly. 
   • This creates a temporary visual inconsistency that can be resolved by refreshing the page.
   • Note that changing themes through ChatGPT Settings works correctly without need for page refresh!
   • I'm working on a solution to avoid the need for page refresh. Your patience and understanding during this time would be greatly appreciated 🙏


📝 FEATURES 📝
   • Accent color via color picker and its live preview
   • Adjustable chat & prompt field widths
   • Custom font family, size, line height, and spacing
   • Light, Dark, and Black (AMOLED friendly) more modern themes
   • Modern chat bubbles for clear message distinction
   • Easy theme switching with floating button
   • Spacious layout for comfortable chatting
   • Subtle animations for improved readability


🔒 PERMISSIONS 🔒 
   • Storage: Saves your GPThemes preferences (font, accent colors, chat widths, etc.)
   • ChatGPT access: Customizes "chat.openai.com" and "chatgpt.com"


⚠️ NOTE ⚠️
   • Optimized for GPT-4o, GPT-4o mini, GPTs Store, DALL-E, Canvas, Browsing/Data Analysis, Web Search, Advanced Voice Mode.
   • OpenAI o1 models and My GPTs Editor are not fully supported yet.


🔧 COMPATIBILITY 🔧
   • Regular updates to maintain compatibility with ChatGPT changes. I appreciate your patience during any brief disruptions.


🆓 FREE AND OPEN SOURCE 🆓
   • Committed to accessibility and transparency. 

🔗 https://github.com/itsmartashub/GPThemes


🤝 FEEDBACK & SUPPORT 🤝 
   • If you encounter persistent issues or have suggestions for improvement, please feel free to open an issue on GitHub or contact me via email. Your feedback is invaluable and helps me identify and resolve problems more effectively.

🔗 https://github.com/itsmartashub/GPThemes/issues
📩 gpthemes.contact@gmail.com

Elevate your ChatGPT experience with GPThemes - where functionality meets style!
